Package net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceBrowser
    The interface of Objects, which can handle resource browsing.
    ResourceReader
    This inteface is implemented by the objects which can read resource either text resource or image resource.
    ResourceReaderHandler
    Interface implemented by objects, which can manage resource readers.
    ServletContextAware
    This interface defines the interface to be implemented by any object that wants to be notified of the ServletContext that it runs in.
    ServletContextResourceReader
    The interface for the servletContext resource reader
    StreamResourceReader
    This interface is implemented by objects which can read Stream resources.
    TextResourceReader
    This interface is implemented by objects which can read text resources.
    WorkingDirectoryLocationAware
    This interface is implemented by the class which are aware of the the temporary resource location.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseServletContextResourceReader
    This class defines the resource reader which is based on the servlet context
    FileSystemResourceReader
    This class defines the resource reader which is based on a file system and which can handle text and stream resources.
    PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader
    This class defines a resource handler which is based on the servlet context (so which retrieves the resource from the web application), and which use a path prefix to access the resource.
    ServletContextResourceReaderHandler
    This class defines the manager for resource reader.
